name: Jailbreak Kingdom VR
description:
Keys: Use the ALT + Mouse to look around.

Use the Left Mouse Button (LMB) to select in place of the Google Cardboard select button.

Jailbreak Kingdom VR is a VR adventure prototype in which the player must rescue other adventurers from a jail cell. The game was made using VFX made after completing a course on VFX and was the first of the 30 game prototypes that I made to practice my VR prototyping skills.

Players must use the beacons to open the jail gate and then use the Google Cardboard button once inside the jail cell to free the adventurers.

I used a World Space UI for the menu and a camera overlay UI for the mission text.
